about_the_game:
At the center of every planet lies a primordial being whose latent energy sparked life to grow upon them. After a sudden exile, the heroes land on planet Kravok, and are entered into a fight for survival. One of the heroes must prove themselves to be strong enough to rule, and claim the title of 'Primarch'.

Primarch is a roguelike auto-battler where you refine the skills and strategy of a single unit, instead of a party.

Become the perfect weapon
Absorb, fuse, and mutate the skills of your foes to create new effects. You can further augment your strength with the passive benefits of trinkets and talents.

Death is only the beginning
Upon falling in battle, a hero will enter ‘Primal Mode’, where a limited resource called ‘Primal’ will be used instead of hit points. A hero’s hit points are restored after each combat, but run out of Primal, and it’s all over.

Tribal warfare
The inhabitants of planet Kravok are split into 8 tribes, each mastering a different set of elements. You gain a bonus effect when equipping multiple skills from the same tribe, increasing the strategy. Be warned, hunting the same tribe repeatedly may cause them to summon a powerful deity.

There can be only one
The vile Kravok commands the ghosts of past players. These apparitions are revealed as the boss of each area, allowing you to modify your strategy in advance.

Forge your path
Navigate the world as you desire, with the ability to hunt down specific tribes and event locations. Ferocious tribes, doom spires, glowing craters, breathing rifts, a vengeful ghost, and so much more stand in your way - do you have what it takes to become Primarch?

short_description: Primarch is a roguelike auto-battler centered on a single hero. After being exiled to a foreign planet, you are challenged by a fallen God and pitted against your comrades to determine who is most worthy of the title ‘Primarch’.
